ubc.pavlab.gotrack.utils

Class GOMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ubc.pavlab.gotrack.utils.GOMatrix

  • public class GOMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    + * Creates a file that contains a boolean matrix where rows are genes, columns are GO ids, and entries are whether the + * gene has that term annotated. A matrix like this is created for each edition. + * + * @author asedeno + * @version $Id$ +

      • runGoMatrix

        public static void runGoMatrix(java.lang.String species,
               java.io.File assoc,
               java.util.logging.Logger logger,
               java.lang.String isOldEdition,
               java.lang.String editionAnnotSimple,
               java.lang.String genesFile,
               java.lang.String goTerms,
               int editionNumber,
               ubic.erminej.data.GeneSetTerms gs)
        Parameters:
        tmpdir - Sub directory where intermediate files are found
        gomatrixdir - Sub directory where gomatrix file will be saved
        termdbdir - Directory where termdb file are found.
        dir - Base directory, all other directories are under this directory
        termdbFile - Termdb that will be used to compute gomatrix file
        isOldEdition - Whether termdbFile follows old or new format
        editionAnnotSimple - File that contains only two columns geneid and Go parents
        goTerms - Go terms that will be considered (always present or the complete list)
        edition - String that contains the edition number
